page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT _ CLEE HILL AREA
page.content: Most people in our area work locally.{Clee Hill Plant}is the largest employer. They hire out machinery, such as excavators, fork_ lift trucks, traffic lights and road signs. They employ about 30 people. About 33 people work for{A.R.C.} They quarry stone near our area. Many people are{self_employed.} They own shops, a mini super_market, snack bar, post office, newsagents, butchers, bakers, and garages. Some people work as builders. People own their own farms and employ workers. Some people work in the{shops, {garages,}on{bread}and{milk rounds,}in the{doctor's surgery}and at the { {school.}People who go out of the area to work usually work in{factories,} {service industries}and{government.} There are some{unemployed}people in our area.
